sn55.11:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati rajakarame.
sn55.11:1.2: Atha kho sahassabhikkhunisangho yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho ta bhikkhuniyo bhagava etadavoca:
sn55.11:2.1: “Catuhi kho, bhikkhuniyo, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
sn55.11:2.3: Idha, bhikkhuniyo, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.11:2.4: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.11:2.7: ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti, akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.11:2.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhuniyo, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
